before_input_msg: Ready to learn? Enter your email to create your account.
tree_section_one_content: Learn for free from Scroll's free courses which are made by the best tutors in Latvia.
tree_section_two_content: Communicate with your colleagues, friends using Scroll's unique chatting system.
tree_section_three_content: Scroll offers an easy system for teachers and pupils to check or input grades.
faq_question3: What can i do in Scroll?
faq_question4: What free courses do you offer?
faq_answer1: Scroll is a learning managment system (LMS), created to make learning, communicating more easier and more accessible to students and staff.
faq_answer3: As a registered user you can check your grades, complete assigments, connect with teachers or your fellow colleagues faster and access free or paid courses easier than in any learning managment system. As a teacher you can create assigments, grade student's work, and connect with students without needing any other software.
faq_answer5: Yes, you can. Certification requires a registered account and fees may be applied for the certificate itself.
